title: Create Phuba Government High School interactive app

requirements.text: Create a welcome homepage that displays the school name 'Phuba Government High School' with a hero section introducing the interactive features of the app
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage displays 'Phuba Government High School' prominently
Hero section is visible and introduces the app's purpose
Layout is responsive and works on mobile and desktop

requirements.text: Implement a student directory section where users can view a list of students with basic information (name, class, student ID)
acceptanceCriteria: Student list displays with name, class, and student ID
Data is stored and retrieved from the backend
List is searchable or filterable by class

requirements.text: Create an announcements section where school administrators can post and view announcements with title, content, and timestamp
acceptanceCriteria: Announcements can be created with title and content
Announcements display with timestamp in reverse chronological order
Backend stores and retrieves announcements persistently

requirements.text: Implement a class schedule viewer that displays different class schedules organized by grade or section
acceptanceCriteria: Class schedules are viewable by grade/section
Schedule displays time slots, subjects, and teachers

requirements.text: Create an events calendar section showing upcoming school events with date, time, and description
acceptanceCriteria: Events are displayed in calendar or list format
Each event shows date, time, and description
Events are stored in backend and retrieved for display

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive educational theme with warm, welcoming colors (such as green and gold or navy and white), clear typography suitable for an academic environment, and a professional yet approachable layout that works well for students, teachers, and parents
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme is consistent across all pages
Typography is readable and appropriate for educational context
Layout conveys professionalism while remaining accessible to all user types

constraints: Must use Motoko for backend implementation
Must use React with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS for frontend
All data must persist in the Internet Computer backend
nonGoals: External authentication providers beyond Internet Identity
Integration with third-party school management systems

required: School logo or emblem in a circular badge style with academic imagery (school-logo.dim_200x200.png)
Hero background showing an abstract educational theme with books, graduation cap, or school building silhouette in muted tones (hero-background.dim_1920x600.png)
